name: Arc
description: ARC is at the cutting edge of Web3 and AI technology. Offering tools and proprietary technologies to facilitate the development and management of decentralized projects, ecosystems, and businesses.The cornerstone of these decentralized finance tools is Reactor, a user-friendly graphical user interface (GUI) for Web3, smart contract and protocol contract development. Reactor streamlines the development process, cuts costs, and eliminates human error by giving individuals the power of a small team through enhanced functionality. The Reactor software package is packed with a built-in ARC Virtual Machine (AVM), a proprietary programming language, error detection capabilities, an auto-compiler, and integration with award-winning artificial intelligence (AI) technology. Reactor is capable of ingesting, forking, editing, and mapping any smart contract code, and deploying it across multiple blockchain networks, including zkEVM. With its user-friendly design, comprehensive feature set, and commitment to security, Reactor is the go-to solution for developers and businesses looking to stay ahead in the Web3 space.
